#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,k;
		cin>>n>>k;
		int i,j;
		int a[n];
		//a[0]=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			cin>>a[i];
		bool dp[k+1][n+1];
		for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
			dp[0][i]=1;//if sum is 0 subset exists
		for(i=1;i<=k;i++)
			dp[i][0]=0;//if set is empty subset doesn't exist
		for(i=1;i<=k;i++)
		{
			for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
			{
				dp[i][j]=dp[i][j-1];//excluding last element
				if(i>=a[j-1])
					dp[i][j]=dp[i][j]||dp[i-a[j-1]][j-1];//finding dere is a subset in a from 0-j-1 whose sum is equal to i
			}
		}
		cout<<dp[k][n]<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
